snippet: Pope Francis called for justice to be served in the deadly bombing of a Jewish community center in Buenos Aires 20 years ago that local courts have blamed on Iran.
abstract: Pope Francis calls for justice to be served in deadly bombing of Buenos Aires Jewish community center 20 years ago that local courts have blamed on Iran; investigations into bombing, in which 85 people were killed, have lagged for two decades.
lead_paragraph: Pope Francis called for justice to be served in the deadly bombing of a Jewish community center in Buenos Aires 20 years ago that local courts have blamed on Iran.
